name: Bullets VS Zombie
description:
STILL A VERY EARLY PROTOTYPE

You have a machine.

There's an army of zombies.

Shoot.

You're the grey circle. The zombie are purples. Orange are ammo.

Use the ZQSD keys to move or press G to switch with WASD. Use the mouse to aim and shoot. Use R to reset the game, H to trigger the sound and J to trigger the screenshake.

Loading may be really slow. Sorry. Please be patient.

Please, send me as many feedback as possible !
